title.en: Solo Leveling - The revenge of sung jin-woo (Doujinshi)

description.en:
—Sung Jinwoo, the main character of the anime and manga "Solo levelling". At the beginning of his journey, he was known as the weakest weapon of humanity. He was betrayed by his comrades and left to die alone in a cold and creepy dungeon. In that dungeon, Jinwoo went through real Hell. They cut him, he was crushed, he was tormented, it seemed that he was doomed to a painful death. It was only thanks to a miraculous coincidence that he remained alive. Taking advantage of his second chance, he became the strongest hunter. In this alternate history, Jinwoo finds those who left him to his fate in order to properly punish them and force them to go through the pain that he himself went through. Using a special skill, he reduced the traitors to the size of insects. Having driven them into a trap, he began to carry out his revenge. With his foot, he literally began to turn them into nothing, but he did it as slowly as possible, prolonging the pleasure for himself. Breaking every bone, crushing their body. He made the traitors feel the power of his feet with their whole body. Although their former comrades begged for mercy with pain on their faces and tears in their eyes, their fate was already sealed. For long hours they begged Jinwoo to stop, but his feet continued to destroy their bodies. In the end, they all barely looked human. All that was left of them was minced meat and broken bones. Jinwoo made sure that the traitors felt his power and strength with all their being before death.

---
